11.ara-name: كتاب النكاح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that:The Messenger of Allah said: "A man is not to sell over his brother's sale, nor is he to propose to whom his brother has proposed

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنْ لاَ يَخْطُبَ الرَّجُلُ عَلَى خِطْبَةِ أَخِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About A Man Is Not To Propose To A Woman Who Has Been Proposed To By His Brother
